creator: infoedge.com
descriptionHtml:
If you are still dragging yourself to work – download Naukri.com mobile app and find millions of jobs that you would love to go to in a click. Naukri.com mobile app is the most loved job search app in the country and offers a customized job search experience across all industries, functions, locations and experience levels for graduates, post-graduates, freshers and experienced professionals.

Every month more than 50 lac job seekers use Naukri job search app to discover latest job vacancies and connect with thousands of jobseekers. Some of the key benefits of the app are:

Key highlights of Naukri Job Search App:
• Free – Free registration to create your profile on India’s No. 1 Job site
• Convenient – Easier and faster access to over 5 lacs jobs updated every second in few clicks from the largest pool of jobs in the country
• Personalized- Job recommendations matching your preference for industry, salary, experience or job categories such as MNC jobs, startup jobs, fresher jobs, International jobs, and walk-in jobs
• Efficient – Latest job notifications from all industries like IT, BFSI, Accounting, Finance, BPO, Automobile, Internet, Ecommerce, FMCG, PSU or Govt. jobs such as banking, defense, healthcare and education jobs from top companies.

Naukri App is the best job search app with smart FEATURES that empower you to:

Search:
• Hassle-free job search to find the latest job vacancies matching your profile
• Use advanced and easy filter options to refine your job search for top companies, recruiters, locations and salary as per the requirement
• Get job recommendations for new job openings matching your recent searches
• Find full-time jobs, part-time jobs, internship opportunities, walk-in jobs
• Create up to 5 free job alerts for vacancies matching your preferences

Apply:
• Stay updated and apply to your preferred jobs with latest job alert notifications
• Apply to multiple jobs easily with your Naukri profile
• Apply to jobs posted on career sites of several top companies
• Shortlist and save jobs you want to apply to later

Engage:
• Check new insights on Home screen
• Receive personalized job recommendations directly in your inbox
• Track your job application status easily anytime, anywhere
• Stay connected and engage with recruiters who contact you basis your Naukri profile
• Get instant notifications for recruiters’ action on your profile


Manage:
• Easy profile update on the go
• Upload your resume from your device, Dropbox or Google Drive
• Sign up with your Google (Gmail) or Facebook credentials for automatic email verification
• Upload photo in your Naukri profile for more profile views by recruiters

Get Ahead:
• Keep your profile updated to rank higher in recruiter search results
• Avail Naukri FastForward services to get your resume written by experts, receive advanced job alerts and highlight your profile to recruiters
• Earn a professional certification through Naukri Learning online training courses to enhance your skills and boost career opportunities

Naukri Job Search app is the best application for job seekers that helps job seekers find latest jobs across all domains. Thousands of job openings are just a click away for both experienced and freshers (entry-level) for various job openings such as IT Jobs, Banking Jobs, Finance Jobs, SEO Jobs, Digital Marketing Jobs, Sales Jobs, Accounting Jobs, Railway Jobs, Back Office Jobs, Online Sales Jobs, Telecalling Jobs, Graphic Designer Jobs, HR Jobs, CA Jobs, and Marketing Jobs from top employers.

You can create a free job alert and get matching jobs straight in your inbox.

So, why wait when it’s time to speed up your job search! Get ready for a hassle-free job search experience -download the FREE Naukri Job Search App today.

Have any questions, feedback or suggestions; feel free to reach out to us at android@naukri.com.

The new and updated Nauki.com mobile app helps you stay ahead in your job search by helping you instantly access new jobs added on the platform, connect with recruiters, apply from a pool of handpicked and recommended jobs based on your profiles, and view apply history from millions of live jobs, all at one place!
Every month more than 60 Lac job seekers use Naukri job search app to for a more customized job search experience and discover latest job vacancies.

What makes Naukri Job Search App work for you?
• Free & Convenient – Free registration and faster access to 4 Lac+ jobs from top companies on India’s No. 1 Job site.
• Easy Tracking: Review your profile performance by recruiters’ action, activities, and more.
• Personalized job search- Job recommendations matching your preference for industry, salary, experience or job categories such as MNC jobs, Work-From-Home jobs, startup jobs, fresher jobs, International jobs, WFH Jobs, and walk-in jobs
• Instant job alerts– Latest job notifications from all industries like IT, BFSI, Accounting, Finance, BPO, Automobile, Internet, Ecommerce, FMCG, PSU or Govt. jobs such as banking, defense, healthcare and education jobs.
• Insights: Get useful insights such as company details, ratings, company hiring trends, and more.

What’s New?
On the Naukri mobile app, you can get quick insights on:
• Companies & industries hiring under the live company & industry hiring tracker introduced under 'Step-Up Initiative'
• Live webinars with industry leaders to gain more insights on advancing your career.
• Curated high quality content around Work-From-Home jobs and productivity, tips on virtual interviews and trending online courses for upskilling.
• Marking your profile as ‘immediately available’ for recruiters
• Expanded list of jobs for different categories such as Remote Jobs, Freelance Jobs, Work-From-Home Jobs, Start-Ups Hiring Jobs, Top Unicorns Hiring, and Top MNCs Hiring

SMART FEATURES:

Search:
• Get latest job vacancies matching your profile
• Use advanced and easy filter options to refine your job search for top companies, recruiters, locations and salary as per your requirement
• Get job recommendations for job openings matching your recent searches
• Create up to 5 free job alerts for vacancies matching your preferences
Apply:
• Stay updated and apply to your preferred jobs with latest job alert notifications
• Apply to jobs posted on career sites of several top companies
• Shortlist and save jobs you want to apply to later

Engage:
• Get new insights on your Home screen
• Track your job application status easily anytime, anywhere
• Engage with recruiters who contact you basis your Naukri profile
• Get instant notifications for recruiters’ action on your profile

Manage:
• Update profile easily anytime
• Upload your resume from your device, Dropbox or Google Drive
• Sign up with your Google or Facebook account
• Upload photo easily for more profile views by recruiters

Get Ahead:
• Keep your profile updated to rank higher in recruiter search results
• Avail Naukri FastForward services to get your resume written by experts, receive advanced job alerts and highlight your profile to recruiters
• Earn a professional certification through Naukri Learning online training courses to enhance your skills and boost career opportunities

Thousands of job openings are just a click away for both experienced and freshers (entry-level) for various job openings such as IT Jobs, Banking Jobs, Finance Jobs, SEO Jobs, Digital Marketing Jobs, Sales Jobs, Accounting Jobs, Railway Jobs, Back Office Jobs, Online Sales Jobs, Telecalling Jobs, Graphic Designer Jobs, HR Jobs, CA Jobs, and Marketing Jobs from top employers.
So, why wait when it’s time to speed up your job search?

Download the FREE Naukri Job Search App today.

Have any questions, feedback or suggestions; feel free to reach out to us at android@naukri.com.

title: Naukri.com Job Search App: Search jobs on the go!

creator: infoedge.com
descriptionHtml:
The new and updated Nauki app helps you stay ahead in your job search and explore the latest jobs in India. You can search jobs on the go and easily connect with 5 Lakh+ recruiters hiring actively on Naukri.com.

The best job search app helps you search jobs and also shine in your career with the latest industry & job insights. Naukri.com online job search app, indeed, is one of the most loved job vacancy apps for those who want to work in India. It offers a customized job search experience across all industries, functions, locations, and experience levels.

Every month, lakhs of job seekers like you use this job search app to find the latest job vacancies and move ahead in their careers. Naukri app is the best job search app that caters to all your needs without downloading any separate government jobs alert app, local job search app, part-time jobs app, or work from home jobs app.

Benefits of using Naukri Job Search App

• Ease of job application tracking – View your profile performance, search appearances, and recruiter actions anytime.
• Enhanced visibility with recruiters- You can make the perfect first impression on recruiters and stand out with the newly added Video profile feature, exclusively on the Naukri.com app.
• Convenient job search – Get quicker access to the latest jobs updated every second from the largest pool of job vacancies in the country. You can shortlist and save jobs you want to apply to later.
• Personalized job recommendations- Get job recommendations matching your preference for industry, salary, experience, or job categories such as MNC jobs, Work from home jobs, startup jobs, freelance jobs, remote jobs, fresher jobs, International jobs, jobs for interns, telecalling jobs, walk-in jobs, and jobs for freelancers.
• Hiring trends & insights: Get detailed job insights such as trending skills, top-paying skills, trending online courses, company ratings, and career advice on Naukri Pulse to make a smarter career move.

Frequently Asked Questions :

How can I search for a relevant job on the Naukri app?

Naukri job app helps you get relevant jobs matching your profile. You can easily create customized job alerts and start getting the latest job alert notifications directly into your inbox.

How many custom job alerts can be created on the Naukri App?

You can create up to 5 job alerts for any industry such as IT, BFSI, Accounting, Finance, BPO, Automobile, E-commerce, FMCG, or PSU in simple steps. Getting customized job alert notifications for any profile in functional areas such as banking jobs, telecalling jobs, fresher jobs, marketing jobs, back office jobs, Digital marketing jobs, or graphic designer jobs from top companies is the biggest advantage.

What are the top companies hiring on Naukri.com?

Think of your dream employers and they are hiring on Naukri.com. You can easily find top companies under different categories such as MNC jobs, Startup jobs, fresher jobs, IT jobs, etc.

Naukri.com app is indeed, one of the best job search apps for all your needs. Whether you are looking for part-time jobs app, work from home jobs app, government jobs alert app, or local job search app, Naukri app is the one-stop job vacancy app for you.

Naukri.com job vacancy app helps job seekers find the latest job openings across all functional areas such as IT Jobs, Banking Jobs, Finance Jobs, SEO Jobs, Digital Marketing Jobs, Sales Jobs, Railway Jobs, Telecalling Jobs, HR Jobs, CA Jobs, and Marketing Jobs from top employers.

No need to download separate job apps for government jobs alert app, work from app job apps, part time jobs app, or local job search app as Naukri job app is the best job search app.

Download the FREE Naukri Job App today and experience a hassle-free job search with Naukri.com, the best job search site in India.

Reach out to us at android@naukri.com for any feedback.

The new and updated Naukri app helps you to stay ahead in your job search and explore the latest jobs in India. You can search jobs on the go and easily connect with 5 Lakh+ recruiters hiring actively on Naukri.com.

The best job search app not only helps you in finding the right job but also makes you shine in your career with the latest industry & job insights. Naukri.com online job search app, indeed, is one of the most loved job vacancy apps for those who want to work in India. It offers a customized job search experience across all industries, functions, locations, and experience levels.

Every month, lakhs of job seekers use this job search app to find the latest job vacancies and move ahead in their careers. Naukri app is the best job search app that caters to all your needs without downloading any separate government jobs alert app, local job search app, part-time jobs app, or work from home jobs app.

Benefits of using Naukri Job Search App:

• Ease of job application tracking – View your profile performance, search appearances, and recruiter actions anytime.
• Enhanced visibility with recruiters- You can make the perfect first impression on recruiters and stand out with the newly added Video profile feature, exclusively on the Naukri.com app.
• Convenient job search – Get quicker access to the latest jobs updated every second from the largest pool of job vacancies in the country. You can shortlist and save jobs you want to apply to later.
• Personalized job recommendations- Get job recommendations matching your preference for industry, salary, experience, or job categories such as MNC jobs, Work from home jobs, startup jobs, freelance jobs, remote jobs, fresher jobs, International jobs, jobs for interns, telecalling jobs, walk-in jobs, and jobs for freelancers.
• Hiring trends & insights: Get detailed job insights such as trending skills, top-paying skills, trending online courses, company ratings, and career advice on Naukri Pulse to make a smarter career move.

How can I search for a relevant job on the Naukri app?

Naukri job app helps you get relevant jobs matching your profile. You can easily create customized job alerts and start getting the latest job alert notifications directly into your inbox.

You can create up to 5 job alerts for any industry such as IT, BFSI, Accounting, Finance, BPO, Automobile, E-commerce, FMCG, or PSU in simple steps. Getting customized job alert notifications for any profile in functional areas such as banking jobs, telecalling jobs, fresher jobs, marketing jobs, back office jobs, Digital marketing jobs, or graphic designer jobs from top companies is the biggest advantage.

What are the top companies hiring on Naukri.com?

Think of your dream employers and they are hiring on Naukri.com. You can easily find top companies under different categories such as MNC jobs, Startup jobs, fresher jobs, IT jobs, etc.

No need to download separate job apps for government jobs alert app, work from app job apps, part time jobs app, or local job search app as Naukri job app is the best job search app.

Download the FREE Naukri Job App today and experience a hassle-free job search with Naukri.com, the best job search site in India.
